@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Flexible Weapons)}

Benefits

When wielding a bullwhip, weighted chain, chain whip, nunchaku, or three-section staff, the character gains an additional 5 feet of reach with the weapon, receives a +2 attack bonus to all Trip attempts, and when attempting to Disarm their target gains no benefit from holding a weapon in two hands.
